channel.title: Comments on: 5k donation for a lucky startup

item.title: By: James Corbett
item.dc:creator: James Corbett
item.description: Thanks Fergus. And thanks to all the supporters who have turned a simple idea into something that can actually make a difference to one startup.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Fergus. And thanks to all the supporters who have turned a simple idea into something that can actually make a difference to one startup.
